data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,429,500 souls in Markazi and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Markazi, Iran
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Markazi. Through your servants plant 285 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Markazi.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 7,447 believers in Markazi, Iran how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Luri, Northern people.
Father, please give the church in the state of Markazi prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Markazi, Iran that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary:
the state of Markazi, Iran has a population of 1,429,500.

We estimate Markazi has 7,447 people who might know Jesus, 19,304 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,402,749 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Markazi, Iran a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
